articles.author: Annoa Abekah-Mensah
articles.title: King Charles receives a frosty welcome in Australia in first overseas tour as monarch - CNN
articles.description: King Charles and Queen Camila are embarking on their first overseas tour since ascending the throne. CNN’s Max Foster explains why some Australians are apprehensive about their visit.
articles.content: King Charles and Queen Camilla are embarking on their first overseas tour since ascending the throne. CNN's Max Foster explains why some Australians are apprehensive about their visit.
